tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Had a career-best performance when he T11 at the Nine Dragons Open in mid-November. An up-and-down four rounds at Nine Dragons GC resulted in an opening 68 followed by a 76. Settled his play on the weekend, recording scores of 72-70 to just miss the top 10. Has made the cut in the only three events he's played on the Ping An Bank China Tour – PGA TOUR China Series. Also T55 at the Ping An Bank Open and T31 at the Cadillac Championship. In only four starts on the Ping An Bank China Tour – PGA TOUR China Series, finished 59th on the Order of Merit, making the cut in each of his appearances. Had a career-best performance when he T11 at the Nine Dragons Open in mid-November. An up-and-down four rounds at Nine Dragons GC resulted in an opening 68 followed by a 76. Settled his play on the weekend, recording scores of 72-70 to just miss the top 10. Has made the cut in the only three events he's played on the Ping An Bank China Tour – PGA TOUR China Series. Also T55 at the Ping An Bank Open and T31 at the Cadillac Championship…Continued his good play two weeks later when he earned his first top-10, a T9 at the Capital Airlines – HNA Real Estate Championship. Opened with three consecutive 70s before shooting a career-low 67 on the final day.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T9th in 2015 at the Capital Airline HNA Real Estate Championship.
